title: SWR Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 46 Sports Quota Posts
description: The South Western Railway (SWR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 46 Sports Quota Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ 10th pass, ITI, 12th, Any Degree, and Diploma can apply for the SWR Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
